about_the_game:
You wake up on a mysterious bush path towards an illuminated hotel. Creepy sounds and haunting shadows surround you. Upon arrival, you discover that you must solve puzzles and unravel secrets to understand your identity and how you got there. Investigate and discover why you are in this enigmatic place.

Features:


  • Intriguing Escape Game: Immerse yourself in a mysterious room escape game located in an old hotel full of secrets and enigmas to solve.

  • Variety of Puzzles: Enjoy a wide range of puzzles, from logic and visual puzzles to memory tests and skill challenges.

  • Deep Environmental Narrative:** The story unfolds through found objects, scattered notes and elements of the environment that tell a fragmented story full of mystery.

  • Immersive Exploration: Investigate the hotel and its surroundings, collecting objects and clues that will help you unravel the truth about your identity and the nature of the place.

  • Interactions with Enigmatic Characters: Encounter mysterious characters who can provide you with crucial information or divert your path with deception.

  • Tense and Creepy Atmosphere: Experience a disturbing atmosphere with shadows that move with your lamp, creating an atmosphere of constant tension and mystery.

  • Narrative Challenges: Enigmas and puzzles will not only challenge your mind, but will also unlock memories and reveal crucial details about your past.

content_descriptors.notes: There is no physical violence but a psychological horror story, full of mystery.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 / AMD Radeon HD 7870 or equivalent with 2GB VRAM 5
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-8700K CPU @ 3.70GHz 3.70 GHz
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080 TI
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 9 GB available space

short_description: Meal is a mystery escape room game, where you must solve a series of puzzles to progress and discover the truth behind an enigmatic hotel. With challenges and secrets, combining exploration, varied puzzles, and an intriguing story. Can you solve the puzzles and escape from the illuminated hotel?
